edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

Class SigmaVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.SigmaVerifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaProtocolVerifier

    public class SigmaVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProtocolVerifier
    This class manages the communication functionality of all the sigma protocol verifiers, such as send the challenge to the prover and receive the prover messages.

    It uses SigmaVerifierComputation instance of a concrete sigma protocol to compute the actual calculations.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        public boolean verify(SigmaCommonInput input)
               throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Runs the verification of this protocol.

        This function executes the verification protocol at once by calling the following functions one by one.

        This function can be called when a user does not want to save time by doing operations in parallel.

        Specified by:
        verify in interface SigmaProtocolVerifier
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        true if the proof has been verified; false, otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem during the serialization mechanism.
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem during the communication phase.

      • sendChallenge

        public void sendChallenge()
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Receive message from the prover and sends the challenge.

        Runs the following lines from the protocol:

        "RECEIVE first message from the prover.

        SEND challenge to prover".

        This is a blocking function!

        Specified by:
        sendChallenge in interface SigmaProtocolVerifier
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if failed to send or receive a message.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • processVerify

        public boolean processVerify(SigmaCommonInput input)
                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Receive message from the prover and verify the proof.

        Runs the following lines from the protocol:

        "RECEIVE second message from the prover

        VERIFY proof".

        This is a blocking function!

        Specified by:
        processVerify in interface SigmaProtocolVerifier
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        true if the proof has been verified; false, otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if failed to receive a message.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
